name: BRIKO: The best bricks breaker game
name_original: BRIKO: The best bricks breaker game
description:
Compete against players worldwide to be the best in all of puzzledom!

How to Play
- Tap and swipe the screen with your finger to aim the ball, then let go to fire!
- Clear levels by breaking all the bricks on screen.
- Don't let the bricks reach the bottom, or it's game over!
- Find the best angles to hit more bricks.

Features
- Free to play!
- Create your own stages in BRIKO!
- Share your creations with players all over!
- Take on opponents and become the champion!
- Challenge the top score every week in Weekly Marathon!
